one_reviews_text:
Functions properly and the shooting feels nice.

It's like a light gun rail shooter in VR with more movement options. Perfectly playable while sitting down. I didn't feel very immersed though.

At level 9 I noticed the game wasn't getting more fun. The sideways conveyors were the last straw for me. Most of the enemies and obstacles after level 2 were annoying rather than fun and challenging. At 5-10 € I'd be happy with the hour I had with the game, for 20 € I expected more. I won't be refunding because I feel that there is passion behind this, but at this point I'm not very impressed with the results.

I bought the game in the oculus store, but it does not start.
as well as in the description of the game the weight of the game is 2.31 gb, but when loading it is indicated 300mb
I get an error when starting
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later. (OVR57100773)
after rebooting the window the game is working.
For $ 20 expected more
review_feedback: Nobody is reporting this problem. Please, delete the game, restart the PC and download it again.
